item.title: Export Firefox Synced Tabs
item.description: I tend to have many tabs open. Like way too many. I first noticed this behaviour when the tabs counter in my browser became a smile. But that is fine, everybody knows someone like that, hell, you may even be that person. What I am here to talk about is a healthy routine I’ve developed: from time to time (ideally once a month), close all tabs. But hey, firefox has a feature that allos closing old tabs automatically, somebody may say.
